survey_name: Remote Work Ergonomics and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how remote workers set up their workspaces and the impact of ergonomic practices on productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working remotely?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice response. Ensure the options cover a broad range of working hours.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working remotely?

questions.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you use in your remote workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Include an option for respondents who do not use any ergonomic equipment.

script.question_text: Which of the following ergonomic equipment do you use in your remote workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your current remote workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice response. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How would you rate the comfort of your current remote workspace setup?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face with your remote workspace setup? (Open-ended)
questions.client_notes: Allow for open-ended responses to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive answers.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face with your remote workspace setup? (Open-ended)

questions.question_text: Has your employer provided any support for your remote workspace setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice response. Include options to capture varying levels of employer support.
